name: The Art of Reflection
summary: The Art of Reflection is a first-person puzzle game where you traverse mirrors as if they were natural extensions of space. Solve puzzles, uncover secrets, and perform gravity-shifting acrobatics through a sprawling environment as you learn to navigate this world with mastery.
